Articles.Content:
Well, this video isn't particularly useful, and it is pretty laggy for which I am sorry. But I decided to do a video showing a very small custom cowling thing to cover rovers and satellites I have used a massive one in another video inspired by both Katateochi's modded constellation video and pixel staches (<- I think it was him lol) mystery box video (unsure of the official name, sorry) .

(The video where I used the big custom cowl / ferring is : KSP 0.22 :: 1 :: Mission launch )

I am also sorry for the resolution, frame rate and voice over as I am not a professional Youtuber. As pointless as this video is, I do hope someone can find it helpful.

Happy flying!

(Any feed-back on if or how this is / could be useful would be highly appreciated!)

Edited October 22, 2013 by Gonzo44v
